name: Mizjam Shock
description:
A quick game made in 22 hours, didn't have a ton of time to work but it was fun working with everyone.

See if you can solve the lack of mystery at Miziziziz Station. Where the Quadoptimum corp is doing nefarious things.

All 2d art assets were from the sprite pack. All 3d assets were made by me, Font asset a collaboration with Neverknow247.

Music Attributions:

Anxiety by Kevin MacLeod
Very Low Note by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/3374-anxiety
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4581-very-low-note
